product_name: Smith Pivlock Overdrive Interchangeable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: From tough competition to casual fun, the Smith Pivlock Overdrive Interchangeable Sunglasses sport a patent-pending interchangeable lens system that keeps up with fast-paced activities in any light. Ergonomically adjusted to maximize integration with bike helmets and running hats so you can focus on the open road or trail ahead and leave the competition behind. 3 sets of interchangeable lenses with hydrophobic lens coatings offer proven performance. Platinum lenses reduce color distortion in bright light; Sol-X lenses are perfect for medium light and overcast conditions; clear lenses are great for low light and indoor use. Castor-based polymer frames feature 2-position adjustable nose pads and slide-on temple tips. The Smith Pivlock Overdrive Interchangeable Sunglasses offer a medium fit with large coverage.
